content:
From: Gergely Buday <gbuday@gmail.com>
Hi,

I would like to change the font of the proofs in the generated LaTeX document.

I have not found the word "font" neither in the Isar reference nor in
the System manual.

Is there a canonical way to do this other than digging into
isabelle.sty, root.tex and using XeLaTeX?

  • Gergely

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
See also the thread "outputting colours in isabelle documents" from
06-Aug-2014 here
https://lists.cam.ac.uk/mailman/htdig/cl-isabelle-users/2014-August/msg00058.html

Colors and fonts are managed analogously in LaTeX.

Makarius
